name: Oracle J2EE Tutorial
description:
Get rid of this old schools sun/oracle java tutorial style.

Adds some nice CSS3 Columns and gives the content more weight relative to the TOC. Plus increase the default font size to something more easily readable.

Marks the currently mouse hovered block with a blue background to give the reader visible feedback.

Tips: 
- Click and Hold Images to enlarge temporarily
